target.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "events")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] =~ /.* started/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "events")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] =~ /.* ended/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

description: JMeter performance testing live results dashboard, utilizing Flux queries (Influxdb 2.x)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minAT")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maxAT")

started_count_last=from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "startedT")

ended_count_last=from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "endedT")
  
active_count = join(tables:{started_count_last:started_count_last, ended_count_last:ended_count_last}, on:["_time"])
|> map(fn:(r) => ({
_value: r._value_started_count_last- r._value_ended_count_last}))
  |> yield(name: "active_count")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> cumulativeSum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "countError")
  |> cumulativeSum()

successPercentage = () => {

allCount=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])
  
okCount=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])
  
  return join(
      tables:{allCount:allCount, okCount:okCount},
      on:["application"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             
             percentage: r._value_okCount / r._value_allCount         
    }))       
}

successPercentage()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /count*/)
  |> sum()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_measurement"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: float(v: r.countError) / float(v: r.count) * 100.0}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "min")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "max")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["responseCode"])
  |> group(columns: ["responseCode"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> count()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "# Samples"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "# Passed"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "# Failed"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Avg"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> median()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Median RT"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "min")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> min()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Min"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "max")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> max()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Max"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct95.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "exact_mean")
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "95%"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct99.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.99, method: "exact_mean")
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "99%"})

countAll = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])

countError = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])

join(
      tables:{countAll:countAll, countError:countError},
      on:["transaction"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             transaction: r.transaction,
             ErrorRate: r._value_countError / r._value_countAll         
}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["responseMessage"] != "")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Over Time (Response Times, Metrics, Active Threads, Requests)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"], mode:"by")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meanAT")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Total")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /countError/)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Failed")

panels.title: Total vs Failed Requests Over Time
Throughput (Network Traffic, Hits & Transactions Per Second)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "maxAT")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Active Threads")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Transations Per Second")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "countError")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Errors Per Second")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Sent Bytes")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "rb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Received Bytes")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Average(Combined)")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "90th Percentile")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct95.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "95th Percentile")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 60s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 60.0}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.statut)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 60s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 60.0}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.statut)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko" or r["statut"] == "ok" )
  |> drop(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 60s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 60.0}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "${transaction}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> cumulativeSum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "${transaction}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> cumulativeSum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "${transaction}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> cumulativeSum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "${transaction}")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"], mode:"by")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "${transaction}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Average")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "${transaction}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "90th Percentile")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct95.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "${transaction}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "95th Percentile")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct99.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "${transaction}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "99th Percentile")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement_name}")
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "application") 
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
list.name: application
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement_name}")
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "application") 
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "transaction") 
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] != "internal")
list.name: transaction
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "transaction") 
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] != "internal")
